attributes.action: give car enthusiast somewhere to meet in the uk
attributes.additional_details: all we want is for some where for us car enthusiast to show our cars of with no bother from the public and where the public cant moan or complain
attributes.background:
us car enthusiast our being named as boy racers by public due to the noise and driving of some people give us a place to meet away from public to stop this 
car enthusiast our willing to pay a membership fee if you find us somewhere to use

rejection.details:
Providing a space for car enthusiasts is likely to be a planning decision for a local council. If you would like a meeting place in your local area, you could talk to your local council about what you could do to make this happen. 

In any case, people who start petitions are asked to give their own name, not the name of a group or organisation. We're sorry if this wasn't clear to you.
